TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
Well....

Devnote hype? Anyone?

They surely are just sadistic ...

they surely sit in their office, with their hands above a big round red button that bears the inscription "Start Upload of KSP 0.24" and read in this thread,

waiting for us to become totally utterly desperate, before they press the button

July 20th is a Sunday, they would never release on a weekend. If anything (if not today) it would be tomorrow for the anniversary of the Apollo 11 launch (7/16 @ ~9:30am CST).

Def not the 20th. Still think today or tomorrow.

At this point, I'm thinking my original guess was accurate. FAQ in place of devnotes tonight, with release tomorrow.
I still think it will be next week. Tuesday the 22nd.

Rowsdower said it'd be released within one day of the media group releasing their videos, which would imply today. Maxmaps said a few days. I am hoping for today, but they don't seem to be sure on a date.

Now it's more than 24 hours after the media group released their videos

When I remember it right it was yesterday 17 or 18 o'clock in middle Europe

Why? A mod specifically said it wouldn't be a week, so as to not fall into the quagmire that we had with 23.5. If they did get behind, they'd just tell them. They're smart enough to realize that that would be the best way to keep everyone calm.
Maxmaps said 4 or 5 days and the videos came out yesterday, so hopefully tomorrow but probably more like Friday or something

They surely are just sadistic ...

they surely sit in their office, with their hands above a big round red button that bears the inscription "Start Upload of KSP 0.24" and read in this thread,

waiting for us to become totally utterly desperate, before they press the button

Like this one?
Apollo 11 launched on July 16, 1969. At this point, I'm going for tomorrow.

xDDD you made my Day Godot + Starwhip!

In middle Europe it's the 16th of July! then give it to us! xD

Like this one?

"To push or not to push the button....that is the question."
I wasn't aware that Rowsdower said that. Lets take an average and say it will be out Wednesday. Then it gives them a chance to do another Devnotes or a Q&A session or something.
Thinking it over it does make more sense that they'd launch the update on the launch anniversary not the landing anniversary.

I found out why SQUAD isn't releasing the update.

They have Operating System issues, as in:
I think they were aiming for today and got delayed by unforeseen issues. I think it'll launch tomorrow, and the Apollo 11 launch date is just incidental.
It's been 18 hours since they released the YT playlist on the dev blog. Hopefully they will at least give us a release date. Or maybe they already went home for the day.
Atleast we should get Devnotes soon.. ish.
I think it's reasonable to expect devnotes (or FAQ, or some sort of dev comments on things) tonight at some point.
I expect the FAQ in lieu of devnotes this week.
My Steam client is downloading something... it's.... it's.... a Terraria update.

Like this one?

Exactly ... now we just need someone who presses it

Every time I see "Bad Gateway" I imagine a network admin hitting a web server with a rolled up newspaper and saying "Bad gateway! Bad!"

Oh man you've made my day. You're so going to end up in my sig.
Nearing the 100th page! woohoo!

Nearing the 100th page! woohoo!

More like a wooo on my end. Glorious feeling having nearly 1k posts in a thread made by me
